title: Weather: understanding precipitation
brief_description: Use of cloud photography and animation to explain relative humidity, dew point, types of clouds, and why various kinds of preciipitaiton occur. Explains precipitation in terms of water and temperature. Classifies clouds according to how they are formed and according to their altitudes.
